https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t5gU0HQJEZHwZgDJPaFY2t5suOC.jpg Kathir comes from a poor family and aspires to study hard and start earning. After turning down many girls, he falls for Shweta, a rich girl, but both do not confess their feelings to each other. April Maadhathil
